content: **elegant christmas heart in cotton viscose or drops safran and glitter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** approx 8 cm 3 15 high **materials** drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 50 g color no 07 red and use drops glitter from garnstudio 2 spools color no 08 red drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm / us c/2 pattern links danish version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/dk/julehilsen php lang=dk
